channel.title: Protocols for Future, Large-Scale & Diverse Network Transports

item.description: PFLDnet 2007 -- Fifth International Workshop on Protocols for FAST Long-Distance Networks 7-9 February 2007 ISI, Marina Del Rey (Los Angeles), California --= 0 ) { haystack = haystack.substring(0, pos) + newtext + haystack.substring(pos+needle.length, haystack.length); } return haystack; } // Insert a clickable e mail link into the document, to fool spa mmers function java_link(mail, text) { // var address = replace( replace(mail, "

PFLDnet 2010    November 28-29, 2010 Franklin & Marshall College    Lancaster, Pennsylvania -- The 8th International Workshop on Protocols for Future, Large-Scale & Diverse Network Transports (PFLDNeT) in beautiful Lancaster, Pennsylvania, will bring together researchers and practitioners from all over the world working in the area of transport layer issues for modern communication networks.
